mapper.select: select * from ROOM_INFO order by room_seq asc

select id, room_seq, member_yn, regdate, resve_date as resveDate, nmpr, drk_yn, stprc, resve_state, resve_date as endDate, resve_time as resveTime from RESVE where room_seq = #{index} order by resve_seq asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESVE (id, room_seq, regdate, resve_date, nmpr, stprc, resve_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{room_seq}, #{regdate}, #{resveDate}, #{nmpr}, #{stprc}, #{resveTime});
